bbscript.stdlib package¶

Submodules¶

bbscript.stdlib.conditions module¶

bbscript.stdlib.conditions.cmd_condition(ctx, op, left, right)¶

To perform condition operations.

op: operation to perform left: left value right: right value

bbscript.stdlib.conditions.cmd_if(ctx, cond, true_block, false_block=None)¶

It returns true block if condition occur

bbscript.stdlib.convertions module¶

bbscript.stdlib.convertions.cmd_bool(ctx, val)¶

returns: it returns a true/false value

bbscript.stdlib.convertions.cmd_float(ctx, val)¶

returns: convert a value in float type

bbscript.stdlib.convertions.cmd_int(ctx, val)¶
bbscript.stdlib.convertions.cmd_string(ctx, val)¶

returns: converts the value as string.

bbscript.stdlib.convertions.cmd_undefined(ctx)¶

returns: None value when there is no val.

bbscript.stdlib.debug module¶

bbscript.stdlib.debug.cmd_dbug(ctx, id, cmd, label=None)¶

id: cmd: label:

returns: command

bbscript.stdlib.even_odd module¶

bbscript.stdlib.even_odd.cmd_is_even(ctx, val)¶

val :

it returns an even value
bbscript.stdlib.even_odd.cmd_is_odd(ctx, val)¶

val :

it returns an odd value

bbscript.stdlib.math module¶

bbscript.stdlib.math.cmd_math(ctx, op: str, left, right)¶

To perform math operations.

op: Math operation to perform left: left value right: right value

value of the left and right parameter with respect to the op.

bbscript.stdlib.utils module¶

bbscript.stdlib.utils.cint(val)¶
returns an int value
bbscript.stdlib.utils.cmd_log(ctx, *args)¶

logs the args

bbscript.stdlib.utils.cmd_unsupported_function(ctx, cmd)¶

To validate unsupported commands

bbscript.stdlib.utils.flt(val)¶
returns a float value

bbscript.stdlib.values module¶

bbscript.stdlib.values.cmd_array(ctx, *args)¶

to return arguments as an array

bbscript.stdlib.values.cmd_doc(ctx, var, meta=None)¶

to get and return command doc

bbscript.stdlib.values.cmd_set(ctx, var, value)¶

to update the command in the context.

bbscript.stdlib.values.cmd_var(ctx, var, field=None)¶

To get and return command variable

bbscript.stdlib.values.var_resolver(ctx, var, field)¶
